T","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol":{"keccak256":"0x69f54c02b7d81d505910ec198c11ed4c6a728418a868b906b4a0cf29946fda84","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8e25e4bdb7ae1f21d23bfee996e22736fc0ab44cfabedac82a757b1edc5623b9","dweb:/ipfs/QmQdWQvB6JCP9ZMbzi8EvQ1PTETqkcTWrbcVurS7DKpa5n"]},"src/AdminRole.sol":{"keccak256":"0x99d1a359e5a0c0c9295fc4977c586cbfeebc8c871c19c8dd1ac3b9e990d0a909","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://97844b0a25c9e208815c068bd9204741af0a1cf60ffcc2ecaf3202752f011d59","dweb:/ipfs/QmaHX5SZArkGRNgEixbiGUzPp1wKY5XhuRJfnXNuLfgwas"]},"src/BDAERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8b83c97c53951365d69346182e916a4869d53326e49c0540083ea97b6de15e06","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fa64eea9bf47d3315f41a15ee2dc933cb6a382697d08d71bfcc8dff62a7d0448","dweb:/ipfs/QmZmPP1AcKaW9wUsokLpwLL1ijMouCy1Bi9x25XmUAMUhW"]},"src/IdentityVerification.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbc1ec4c5dad682caf01eb3d322d78066db73571f89996b5fee9600e1331c8954","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fc791904fc63c220c9b722b86b5ae9fb2290adcc99af552b93952d64c1e97a65","dweb:/ipfs/QmQPb1g6VpoFBKKB2h9Tjk7cZMoZvBJUcfGB6mtUtMWQoa"]},"src/TransferLimiter.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4e0d22d9081587027c39330953fb29b74b28cf1f511610436fba311e3b3b6727","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a7c721e4e4c0dbb4a89039bc2dc0197233a52709240d363fd0b5a24cb44944b7","dweb:/ipfs/QmYxYm3qwTtBgpJGjxAhmBByFd1XDfTCKFsV9AtUZMfEJg"]}},"version":1}

params.provider: Address of the provider to add

addVerifiedAddress(address,uint256).details: Manually adds a verified address (admin function)

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `value` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

blockAddress(address).details: Blocks an address from being considered verified

params._expirationTime: Time after which a verification expires
params._identityProviders: Initial list of trusted identity providers
params._idpAdmins: Initial list of identity provider admins
params._maxDailyMint: Maximum amount that can be minted per day by each minting admin

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the default value returned by this function, unless it's overridden. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

isVerified(address).details: Checks if an address has been verified

returns._0: bool True if the address is verified, false otherwise

mint(address,uint256).details: Mints tokens to a specific address (restricted to minting admins)

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

params.provider: Address of the provider to remove

removeVerifiedAddress(address).details: Removes verification status from an address

setDailyTransferLimit(address,uint256).details: Sets a daily transfer limit for a user

params.user: Address to set the limit for

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Custom transfer function with limits and verification checks

transfer(address,uint256).details: Overrides the standard ERC20 transfer to enforce verification checks

returns._0: success Whether the transfer was successful

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Overrides the standard ERC20 transferFrom to enforce verification checks

returns._0: success Whether the transfer was successful

verifyIdentity(uint256,bytes).details: Allows a user to verify their identity using a signature from a trusted provider

params.signature: The signature from the trusted identity provider
